long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Want to play Crossy Chicken? Play this game online for free in your own Chrome browser, no internet required. Lots of fun to play when bored at home or at school.

From now on you can play Crossy Chicken on Chrome browser easily, without internet, for free.

Crossy Chicken is an arcade game with the gameplay similar to the classic Frogger game. In Crossy Chicken game you have to dodge traffic, hop across logs, evade trains and collect coins. Make sure you don’t stay still for too long or you’re toast! Don’t forget to unlock exciting new characters with your hard earnt coins!

How to play:
Use the arrow keys to move sideways or forward. Don’t stand in the way of upcoming cars, or other incoming objects. You can also use gamepad.

Please visit our website, we have compiled thousands of very attractive games to help you relax after a stressful working hour, entertain and enjoy the game right on your browser! And it's free link: https://monkeymart.org/
long.en_AU,en_US,vi:
Crossy Chicken - Chrome Extension
Get ready for a clucking good time with Crossy Chicken, the addictive Chrome Extension that challenges you to help a brave chicken cross busy roads and rivers!

In this fun and fast-paced game, you’ll navigate through a series of obstacles, including cars, trucks, and rushing water, all while trying to avoid being squished or swept away. With simple controls and a charming art style, Crossy Chicken is easy to pick up but hard to put down.

Collect coins and unlock new characters as you hop your way to safety, aiming for the highest score possible. The vibrant graphics and lively sound effects create an engaging atmosphere that keeps you entertained for hours.

Perfect for players of all ages, Crossy Chicken combines humor and skill in a delightful package.

Download Crossy Chicken and embark on this fun-filled crossing adventure today!

How to play:
Use the arrow keys to move sideways or forward. Don’t stand in the way of upcoming cars, or other incoming objects. You can also use gamepad.

Note: If you want to find more games, we have a link for quick access to our website. Have fun!
